title: Demand for Tesla in China Fueling ‘Home Run’ Quarter
itunes:title: Demand for Tesla in China Fueling ‘Home Run’ Quarter
description:
Dr. Peter Alperin, Vice President at Doximity, discusses coronavirus, vaccine and telemedicine news. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Joe Nocera talk about the story “CEOs Can’t Stay on Society’s Sidelines Anymore.” Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne details his column about President Biden’s new plan for dealing with China. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Dana Hull walks through how demand for Tesla in China is fueling a ‘home run’ quarter for deliveries. And we Drive to the Close with Prabha Ram, Portfolio Manager at American Century Investments.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
